text:
MULTIPLI: Yield Engine for the $50T Tokenized Era! 

Tokenization‚Äôs booming: gold, treasuries, real estate. GPUs - $30-50T on-chain by 2035. Massive growth indeed. But what‚Äôs the issue? These assets just sit there, earning no returns. @multiplifi turns them into yield machines, blending DeFi‚Äôs speed with TradFi‚Äôs scale. 

The Problem: Thousands of new tokens are coming. DeFi can‚Äôt juggle them - each needs custom setup. Multipli‚Äôs rwaUSD fixes it: one rock-solid asset backed by prime RWAs (gold, T-Bills). Big liquidity, simple integration, yield on tap. 

How It Rolls:  

xTokens: Hedge-fund strategies in liquid ERC-20s. Safe, steady profits, DeFi-ready.   
rwaUSD: Borrow against locked-in RWAs. zk tech + top custody = bulletproof. DeFi just needs this one.   
Yield Flow: Plugs rwaUSD into Aave, Maple, Pendle, TLDR = money keeps moving, growing. 

Why Now? TradFi‚Äôs deep markets (stocks, gold) bring trust + heft. rwaUSD links it to DeFi‚Äôs flexibility. Yield‚Äôs the new king. 

2035 Vision: Power trillions: oil, compute, funds. rwaUSD moves $100B+ on-chain. Programmable yields for all.   Heavyweight Partners:  Institutional Muscle: Nomura, Fasanara, Edge Capital, Pantera, Sequoia, BnB.....big money backing.  
RWA Leaders: Ondo, Maple, Monad, Aethir, Avantis, Centrifuge, all pioneers in tokenized assets. 

Why Multipli stands out: Real yields, deeper pools, ditches centralized stables. Tokenization‚Äôs inevitable, yield makes it stick and Multipli is building the infra rquired for this.

Disclaimer - We have invested in $MULTIPLI so please don‚Äôt forget to do your own research.

$ASTS JUST BROKE ABOVE $100  üò≥

$TSM plans to acquire a second major site in Arizona for up to six fabs as Phase 2 moves to 2-nanometer production.

That would make the U.S. home to TSMC‚Äôs most advanced node for the first time.

Serious scale coming.

$GOOGL Waymo just partnered with $DASH to launch autonomous deliveries in Arizona.

Autonomy wins B2B first since logistics scale faster than passengers & this is Waymo locking in that lane early.

$AMZN One Medical just rolled out pay-per-visit healthcare for kids ages 2 to 11.

Visits start at $29 for messaging & $49 for video which is Amazon quietly turning pediatric care into a Prime-style on-demand service.

$TEM just signed a multi-year partnership with $WHWK to use its real-world multimodal data for biomarker-driven cancer research.

This is the moat everyone misses because Tempus is becoming the data backbone for next-gen drug discovery.

$NBIS just launched Nebius AI Cloud 3.0 called Aether built for enterprises moving from AI pilots to full-scale production.

Powered by $NVDA GB200 it delivers supercomputer performance with full governance & the developer freedom needed to scale AI without losing control.

The idea that $SNOW & $PLTR ‚Äúcompete‚Äù was always ridiculous. 

Snowflake is the infra layer where data lives while Palantir is the application layer where that data actually gets operationalized. 

One is the brain & the other is the nervous system.
$SNOW flying off this headline  üëÄ

$SNOW & $PLTR just announced a major AI and data integration partnership linking Snowflake‚Äôs Data Cloud with Palantir‚Äôs Foundry & AIP.

It enables seamless zero-copy data sharing to power AI agents, digital twins & faster enterprise app deployment.

$CRWV just launched ‚ÄúAI Object Storage‚Äù a fully managed data platform built for AI workloads.

Powered by its LOTA tech, it delivers local-level performance, global data access with zero egress fees & claims over 75% lower storage costs for developers.

$BMNR JUST GOT INITIATED WITH A BUY AT $90

B. Riley say it is the largest $ETH Ethereum DATCO with plans to reach a 5% stake in the ETH network by FY26. 

Premium valuation, growing staking revenue & new institutional partnerships could keep the momentum building.

$MSFT, $GOOGL & $AMZN ARE ACCELERATING MANUFACTURING OUT OF CHINA

Microsoft wants 80% of Surface & server output outside the mainland by 2026 as AWS cuts Chinese suppliers & Google shifts to Thailand.

The AI supply chain is moving where control outweighs cost.

northmantrader.com/2025/10/1‚Ä¶

The bond market is approaching an important point in the wedge pattern. Will it hold again?

Standard technical analysis suggests wedge patterns are "continuation" patterns ... a pause in the larger trend. 

In this case, a pause in the larger yield uptrend that began in 2020.

Goldman Sachs predicts hyperscaler capex will reach $1.4 trillion cumulatively from 2025 through 2027, predicting spending of $471 billion next year before rising to $543 billion in 2027.

$MSFT $AMZN $GOOG $META $NVDA

TSMC $TSM raised its 2025 revenue guide to mid-30% growth from close to 30% growth last quarter on the back of ‚Äòvery strong‚Äô AI demand, while also seeing Q4 revenue of $32.2-33.4B, up 22% YoY at midpoint. 

$NVDA $AMD $AVGO $AAPL

TSMC Q3 revenue grew by 40.8% YoY and 10.1% QoQ to $33.10 billion, beating the guidance midpoint by 2.2% on strong AI demand.

GAAP EPS grew by 50.5% YoY to $2.92, beating the estimates by 12.3%.

Management raised full-year revenue guidance from 30% growth to the mid-30s, driven by robust AI-related demand.

$TSM $NVDA $AVGO $AAPL

Amazon $AMZN, Microsoft $MSFT, Meta $META and Google $GOOG have nearly 12GW of data center capacity currently operational, and another 26.2GW under development, according to BloombergNEF. 

The four account for approximately 42% of US data center capacity. 

$NVDA $AMD $AVGO

Oracle $ORCL will be the first hyperscaler to deploy a publicly available GPU cluster powered by 50K AMD $AMD Instinct MI450 Series GPUs, launching in Q3 2026 and expanding in 2027. 

$NVDA $GOOG $MSFT $AMZN

Nscale will deploy ~104K $NVDA GB300s in a 240MW campus in Texas with delivery slated for Q3 2026, with potential to ultimately scale to 1.2GW. 

Nscale is also deploying 12.6K GB300s in Portugal in Q1 2026 and 23K in the UK in Q3 2027 for Microsoft $MSFT Azure services.
Nscale has signed a deal with Microsoft $MSFT to deploy ~200K Nvidia $NVDA GB300 GPUs across four facilites, working with Dell $DELL on the deployment.

Micron has quietly outperformed and is up 3X more YTD than AI leader Nvidia, with GPU demand driving 250%+ memory growth. 

Below, I discuss the one key line item investors must know and what $MU valuation is communicating. ‚¨áÔ∏è

Dell $DELL COO Jeff Clarke: ‚ÄúWe were all wrong how big we thought the AI market was two years ago, and it‚Äôs nothing but bigger.‚Äù

Raymond James Reiterates Strong Buy Rating on $CRM, PT $375

Analyst comments:
"We‚Äôre reiterating our Strong Buy rating on Salesforce after attending the company‚Äôs annual Dreamforce conference in San Francisco, which featured the company‚Äôs first formal analyst day in several years.

The investor presentation provided powerful ammo against key bear debates, both in terms of thematic dynamics (AI) and quantification of growth metrics (new long-term targets). The company‚Äôs confidence in the NNAOV acceleration that should drive accelerating revenue growth in coming years was quite clear, as was the $60B FY30 revenue target (10% organic growth).

This will be fueled by a combination of Data Cloud and AI adoption, but also the inherent benefits of standardizing on a single platform in an agentic era, with Salesforce believing that customer-level economics can grow 3‚Äì4x with Agentforce.

Coupling 10%+ organic growth with a rule of 50 target by FY30, we‚Äôre struggling with the current value placed on shares at just 14x FCF, especially with an increased buyback."

Analyst: Brian Peterson
